title: Facebook : major stakeholders in 2013 , by ownership stake
summary: The Facebook major Month in the 2013 by was Month Accel_Partners , who made 28.2 stake .
The most major Month was Digital_Sky_Technologies , with just 1.5 stake .

In second place was Month Facebook_employees with 25 stake ; third place went to Month Mark_Zuckerberg with 28.2 stake ; fourth place went to Month Elevation_Partners with 1.5 stake and fifth place went to Month Dustin_Moskovitz , who was 7.6 stake .
gold: This statistic illustrates the major Facebook stakeholders as of January 2013 , by ownership stake . In June 2011 , Sean Parker owned 4 percent in Facebook stakes . Mark Zuckerberg owned 24 percent of Facebook
